title: Poor King Box Thing
body: So I got the three shard to unlock the box and when I opened that it gave me a skin I already owned. I was wondering if that was supposed to happen or not?

replies.body:
Yes, hextech boxes of any kind can potentially give you content you already own, since the contents are essentially random (other than this specific box guaranteeing a permanent shard).

Please let me know if you have any other questions.
Yeah that can happen as it is just has a random chance of dropping any skin.
